other_tests.findings: Sequencing of CACNA1A gene revealed a previously undescribed non-sense mutation at arginine 1346 (R1346X).
other_tests.changes_over_time: The patient was restarted on acetazolamide with titration up to 750 mg/day. He has had only 1 episode of ataxia over the next year and his headache has not recurred.
